title: New: Blaenavon – Into The Night / Denim Patches
content:
Having given these teenagers their first whiff of internet fame, I’m claiming any success that Blaenavon earn for myself.

Introducing them well over a year ago, I’ve been eagerly expecting new material from the trio, and these two new tracks come along with the news that they’ll be releasing a 7″ via Paradyse Records, oh and a hilariously awkward promo picture. Into The Night and Denim Patches are two slices of invigorating post-Foals indie, amidst a world where WU LYF no longer play heavy pop and yet Palma Violets and Peace both still exist, it’s mightily refreshing to hear such an exciting young band. Pre-order the 7″ here, or alternatively pick it up at your local HMV in March.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
